about_the_game:
This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode. This is a 'Free Drive' session only giving you instant access to drive the locomotives.

For further gameplay you can create your own sessions in Surveyor using these locomotives. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'CN' in Surveyor.
detailed_description:
This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode. This is a 'Free Drive' session only giving you instant access to drive the locomotives.

For further gameplay you can create your own sessions in Surveyor using these locomotives. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'CN' in Surveyor.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: i5 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
